page.title: 07POLICE STATION
page.content: As soon as we went into Bucksburn Police Station Division "B" we waited for Constable Mackie beside the desk. First we went into the computer room we were allowed to type in our Dads registration number plates. Then we went to the room where you get charged. After that room where they had souvenirs. There were knuckle dusters, and hats. There was a bit of metal that had bits cut out of it. It was found in Pitodrie Football ground last season. It had been thrown by one of the supporters. Next we went to the room where the breathaliser was kept. Sarah was allowed to use it.
